title: Senior Seminar in Culture, Art, and Technology
description: The Senior Seminar Program is designed to allow senior undergraduates to meet with faculty members in a small group setting to explore an intellectual topic in culture, art, and technology (at the upper-division level). Topics will vary from quarter to quarter. Enrollment is limited to twenty students, with preference given to seniors. May be taken for credit four times. Prerequisites: upper-division standing; department authorization required.
